languages.text: "Принять дар из рук твоих — честь, Домин". {n}Кибелла задумчиво вглядывается в собственное отражение на дне кубка и легким движением руки переливает его в ритуальный флакон.{/n}

"It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Принять дар из рук твоих — честь, Домин". {n}Кибелла задумчиво вглядывается в собственное отражение на дне кубка и легким движением руки переливает его в ритуальный флакон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Accepting a gift from you is an honour, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}
"Accepting a gift from you is an honour, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

"It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

languages.text: “能得到你的礼物，我很荣幸，秘者。”{n}绮贝菈若有所思地看着自己在杯中的倒影，随后迅速将手一挥，把杯子里的液体倒进了她的仪式圣瓶里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “能得到你的礼物，我很荣幸，秘者。”{n}绮贝菈若有所思地看着自己在杯中的倒影，随后迅速将手一挥，把杯子里的液体倒进了她的仪式圣瓶里。{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたから贈り物を頂けるとは光栄です、ドミン」{n}キベラは杯に映る自分の姿を物思いにふけるように見つめた後、すばやく手を動かして中身を儀式用のフラスコに注ぎ入れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたから贈り物を頂けるとは光栄です、ドミン」{n}キベラは杯に映る自分の姿を物思いにふけるように見つめた後、すばやく手を動かして中身を儀式用のフラスコに注ぎ入れた。{/n}

languages.text: «Es un honor aceptar un obsequio de usted, Domin». {n}Kibellah escudriña pensativamente su propio reflejo en la copa y, con un rápido movimiento de su mano, vierte el contenido en su petaca ceremonial.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es un honor aceptar un obsequio de usted, Domin». {n}Kibellah escudriña pensativamente su propio reflejo en la copa y, con un rápido movimiento de su mano, vierte el contenido en su petaca ceremonial.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu hediyeyi kabul etmek benim için şereftir Domin." {n}Kibellah, kadehteki yansımasına düşünceli bir şekilde bakıyor ve hızlı bir el hareketiyle içindekileri tören matarasına boşaltıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu hediyeyi kabul etmek benim için şereftir Domin." {n}Kibellah, kadehteki yansımasına düşünceli bir şekilde bakıyor ve hızlı bir el hareketiyle içindekileri tören matarasına boşaltıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Accepter un cadeau de votre part est un honneur, Domin. » {n}Kibellah observe pensivement son reflet dans la coupe, et d'un geste rapide de la main, verse son contenu dans sa fiole cérémonielle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Accepter un cadeau de votre part est un honneur, Domin. » {n}Kibellah observe pensivement son reflet dans la coupe, et d'un geste rapide de la main, verse son contenu dans sa fiole cérémonielle.{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist eine Ehre, ein Geschenk von Euch zu empfangen, Domin." {n}Kibellah betrachtet nachdenklich ihr Spiegelbild auf dem Becher, ehe sie den Inhalt mit einer schnellen Handbewegung in ihre Zeremonienflasche gießt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is an honour to accept a gift from you, Domin." {n}Kibellah looks pensively at her own reflection in the cup and, with a swift motion of her hand, pours its contents into her ceremonial flask.{/n}
